resources.string:
This is an implementation for my thesis
 The purpose of this app is to implement and test some Tango functions.
 I have created three modes in this app.
 The first mode is to scan a library. The user gives input with Tango services to measure the height and the width of the library.
 The second mode is to analyze the points of this library to render some of it's pieces.
 The third mode is to scan a book. First you scan the book's barcode and the you measure it. These values give results from our local DB with book records.

 Keep in mind to use the analyze library mode you need the second app of this Thesis.

 To start you need to scan the library's barcode.



 Nikolaos Karampinas
 Computer Science Department
 Aristotle University of Thessaloniki (AUTH)
 September 2018
You haven\'t scanned a library.\nScan now to start recognizing books.
In order to analyze the points of the library you need to scan and save one
Analyze the points of the library
You need to have the second Thesis app
